testimonials.title: What our clients are saying
testimonials.subtitle: Our clients range from individual investors, to local, international as well as Fortune 500 companies.

client1.text: With the help of the hospitable staff of Al Safar and Partners I was able to get my work done without any hassle. The help I received helped me a great deal to overcome the issues that I faced. I was always updated about my case and my queries never went unanswered.
client1.author: Mohammed Saif

client2.author: Mohammed Saif Ali
